SEARCH
Package gw.api.policy.refresh.relink

Class PerLinkHandler<T extends KeyableBean>

java.lang.Object
gw.api.policy.refresh.relink.PerLinkHandler<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
RelinkHandler<T>
public class PerLinkHandler<T extends KeyableBean> extends Object implements RelinkHandler<T>
Base class for RelinkHandler implementations that only want to override default behavior for specific links. Implementors may also use the forEntity(gw.entity.IEntityType) builder to dynamically create an implementation of PerLinkHandler with the custom link handlers.
